CARMA Connected Threshold Filter This module uses the Connected Threshold Filter to produce a segmentation of an image. 0.1.0
@MODULE_LICENSE_SHORT_DESCRIPTION@ Salma Bengali (CARMA), Alan Morris (CARMA), Josh Cates (CARMA), Rob MacLeod (CARMA) This work was supported by ...
IO Input/output parameters
inputImage Input Image inputImage input MRI/MRA/CT image
outputImage Connected Threshold Filter Output outputImage output Segmented output image
lowerThreshold Lower Threshold lowerThreshold input Lower threshold
upperThreshold Upper Threshold upperThreshold input Upper threshold
seeds Seed/s in the region which is to be segmented out Seeds seeds input
